name: Super Circle Challenge
description:
An intense action game where you shoot enemies as a magenta circle to vanquish the evil other shapes and gather power ups to increase your speed or fire rate!

Thanks for trying my first game ever!

FEATURES!!!

*PAUSING

*MULTIPLE COLORS

*MULTIPLE SHAPES!!!

*NOT MULTIPLAYER (DON'T PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS!)

*BULLETS RENDER!

NOT FEATURES!!!

*RESTARTING THE GAME

*MULTIPLAYER

PATCH NOTES

*BULLETS RENDER

*BOSS IS HARDER

*NO ITEMS IN ROOM 0
